title: Eʾešmah
description: The temple of the god Ea, Eʾešmah (“Exalted House”), was located in the Kumar district of Babylon, in the western half of the inner city. According to the Babylonian topographical text Tintir = Babylon Tablet IV, it was one of seven temples in that part of Babylon.

properties.description: The proposed location of Eʾešmah is based on George 1992: 24 fig. 4, as well as a plan of the ruins of Babylon, with 500 m UTM coordinates.
properties.title: Proposed location of Eʾešmah
